column1: * Description      : To determine the Effective date of and Organization change  a subordinate loop is needed to examine historical records to
*                    determine what was the last historical row where one of the compared fields is changed

column6: Fields grouped as Organization Level elements

column1: IF TRACE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN (RET = ESS_LOG_WRITE(' AXE_HR_ORG_EFFDT_RULE_FF- Starts '))

IF TRACE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN (RET = ESS_LOG_WRITE(' S_ASSIGNMENT_ID = '|| S_ASSIGNMENT_ID|| ', ' || ' S_ASG_START_DATE = '|| S_ASG_START_DATE || ', '|| ' S_FULL_PART = '|| S_FULL_PART || ', '|| ' S_REG_TEMP = ' ||S_REG_TEMP || ', '|| ' S_LOCATION = ' ||S_LOCATION || ', '|| ' S_UNION_CD = ' || S_UNION_CD))

column3: IF TRACE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN (RET = ESS_LOG_WRITE(' L_HIST_ASS_ID = '|| TO_CHAR(L_HIST_ASS_ID) || ', '||' L_HIST_FULL_PART = '|| L_HIST_FULL_PART || ', '|| ' L_HIST_REG_TEMP = '|| L_HIST_REG_TEMP || ', '|| ' L_HIST_LOCATION = ' ||L_HIST_LOCATION || ', '|| ' L_HIST_UNION_CD = ' || L_HIST_UNION_CD))
IF ((L_HIST_FULL_PART <> S_FULL_PART) OR (L_HIST_REG_TEMP <> S_REG_TEMP) OR (L_HIST_LOCATION <> S_LOCATION) OR (L_HIST_UNION_CD <> S_UNION_CD)) THEN

column1: IF TRACE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN (RET = ESS_LOG_WRITE(' Return Value = '|| RULE_VALUE))
IF TRACE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN (RET = ESS_LOG_WRITE(' AXE_HR_ORG_EFFDT_RULE_FF- Ends '))
